thread.title: Felicia

author: Felicia
title: Felicia
text: Designer glasses that are comfortable with lens that have UV protection and anti-glare. It took about 2 weeks for them to make my glasses and then shipping. I am very happy and would definitely order from this site again!! I tried on these glasses at a store and that store wanted 5 times as much $$$ for the same exact thing. I am so happy with this website!!
